    • Method Detail

      • restart

        public static void restart(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String header,
                           java.lang.String content,
                           Connect4 connect4)
        Creates an Alert of type confirmation with given title, header and info text. When "OK" is pressed, the program is restarted. Pressing cancel or [X] keeps the game going.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the pop-up
        header - The header text
        content - The information text
        connect4 - The connect4 game the pop-up should appear in

        Parameters:
